https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hiugiMqQKiWf8qlbb7iKgnka1T6.jpg After a meteor shower strikes Los Angeles, toxic smoke is released across the city causing people to physically change and become violent. A small group of survivors plans to vacate the city by heading to the coast. Disaster L.A.: The Last Zombie Apocalypse Begins Here
